TopicTitle: RO engine igniters, is there a way to turn that off?

Articles.Content:
i really hate it, i mean i tend to turn engines on and off a lot and if the engine just stops working it just adds a pointless layer of extra tedium and kills reusability for most engines :T

i dont know if theres a difficulty setting or config file that i delete a line in somehwere or what, but id like to not have my engines give out because i arbitrarily didnt limit my mission's burns to 5
Open RealFuels/RealSettings.cfg and scroll to the bottom, change the ignitions param from true to false.
